thread.title: At Portland soup kitchen, shock over the murder arrests of 3 drifters
thread.title_full: At Portland soup kitchen, shock over the murder arrests of 3 drifters - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Evan Sernoffsky
title: At Portland soup kitchen, shock over the murder arrests of 3 drifters
text:
Photo: Evan Sernoffsky Three drifters accused of killing two people in the Bay Area were arrested Oct. 7, 2015, at the dining hall of St. Francis of Assisi Catholic Church in Portland. Three drifters accused of killing two people in the Bay Area were...
PORTLAND — The church soup kitchen where three drifters were arrested this week in connection with a pair of Bay Area killings was abuzz Friday, as visitors expressed shock and recalled the police swooping in. Three drifters accused of killing two people in the Bay Area were arrested Oct. 7, 2015, at the dining hall of St. Francis of Assisi Catholic Church in Portland.
